attributes.action: make childrens shoe manufacturers offer wider fitting shoes for children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have a child who unfortunately has wide feet.  We find it hard to pay £30 plus for shoes, trainers, sandals at a certain shoe shop etc every time our child needs new shoes. Having searched for wider fitting shoes for children online we were surprised to find this is a common problem.  It would also be helpful if it was compulsary for all shoe shops to have to offer a proper measuring service... help protect our childrens feet now from illfitting shoes to prevent problems in the future
